metadata.title: CVE-2017-16129 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The HTTP client module superagent is vulnerable to ZIP bomb attacks. In aZIP bomb attack, the HTTP server replies with a compressed response thatbecomes several magnitudes larger once uncompressed. If a client does nottake special care when processing such responses, it may result inexcessive CPU and/or memory consumption. An attacker might exploit such aweakness for a DoS attack. To exploit this the attacker must control thelocation (URL) that superagent makes a request to.

criterions.comment: node-superagent package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
